original_text: And the angels who did not keep their positions of authority but abandoned their proper dwelling—these he has kept in darkness, bound with everlasting chains for judgment on the great Day.
korean_text: 또 자기 지위를 지키지 아니하고 자기 처소를 떠난 천사들을 큰 날의 심판까지 영원한 결박으로 흑암에 가두셨으며

sentences.original_text: And angels who did not keep their positions of authority
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신의 권위의 자리를 지키지 않은 천사들은

sentences.original_text: these he has kept in darkness
for judgment on the great Day
